argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_00id | |- ( 0 + 0 ) = 0 |
| 2 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 3 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- CCfld e. Grp |
| 5 |  | #P_0cn | |- 0 e. CC |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` CCfld ) = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_grpid | |- ( ( CCfld e. Grp /\ 0 e. CC ) -> ( ( 0 + 0 ) = 0 <-> ( 0g ` CCfld ) = 0 ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 5, 9 | #P_mp2an | |- ( ( 0 + 0 ) = 0 <-> ( 0g ` CCfld ) = 0 ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_mpbi | |- ( 0g ` CCfld ) = 0 |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eqcomi | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
